metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2689 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Tor before 0.2.4.26 and 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.11 does not properly handle pending-connection resolve states during periods of high DNS load, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via crafted packets.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2689` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> DoS due to DNS triggering an abort

criterions.comment: tor package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.4.27-1build0.14.04.1').
